sentences.english: Histologically, dentigerous cysts are lined by stratified squamous nonkeratinizing epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 組織學上含齒囊腫爲多層鱗狀未角化上皮細胞所覆蓋。

sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.
sentences.chinese: 單純的囊腫較難與蛛網膜囊腫和表皮樣囊腫相鑑別。

sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.
sentences.chinese: 單純的囊腫較難與蛛網膜囊腫和表皮樣囊腫相鑑別。

sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.
sentences.chinese: 單純的囊腫較難與蛛網膜囊腫和表皮樣囊腫相鑑別。

sentences.english: Large cysts can cause backaches and a dragging sensation.
sentences.chinese: 體積較大的囊腫可引起背痛及牽扯感。

sentences.english: The cysts were well-circumscribed with the adjacent structures.
sentences.chinese: 囊腫與周圍結構界限清楚。

sentences.english: A third BCC is seen in the posterior cervical space.
sentences.chinese: 第三腮腺囊腫位於頸後間隙。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effective therapy of benign adnexa cyst.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討附件良性囊腫的有效治療方法。

sentences.english: A brief discussion has been made in the clinical diagnosis and the causes of misdiagnosis in the first branchial cleft diseases.
sentences.chinese: 文章闡述了第一鰓裂囊腫的臨牀診斷及其誤診原因。

sentences.english: These tumors are often called "dermoid cysts" because they are mostly cystic.
sentences.chinese: 這些腫瘤常常被稱爲“皮樣囊腫”，因形成囊狀。

sentences.english: Objective To enhance the therapeutic effect of simple renal cysts.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高單純性腎囊腫的外科治療效果。

sentences.english: Surgical removal of a breast cyst is necessary only in a few unusual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 只有在不得已的情況下才有必要做手術移除乳腺囊腫。

sentences.english: Can cyst of oral cavity mucous membrane worsen?
sentences.chinese: 口腔粘膜囊腫會不會惡化？

sentences.english: Echocardiography showed a pericardial cystic mass with external compression of the right ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 心臟超音波顯示心臟旁有一水泡狀囊腫且壓迫右心室。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the diagnosis and cure of the rupture of ovary endometriosis cysts.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討卵巢子宮內膜異位囊腫破裂的診斷與治療。

sentences.english: Prognosis for ependymal cysts is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 室管膜囊腫的預後是良好的。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
